Package com.orchestranetworks.d3

Provides classes for distributed data delivery (D3) functionalities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
D3Broadcast The broadcast handler contains the information used in the broadcast operation.
D3Broadcast.Status Global status of the snapshot broadcast operation.
D3Slave D3 slave informations.
D3Slave.State Represents the state of the slave repository.
NodeMonitoring Listener interface that runs on a slave node to perform specific actions when the slave status switches to the states 'Available' or 'Unavailable'.
NodeMonitoringContext Common interface providing an execution context for slave node monitoring.
 

Class Summary
D3Engine Represents the external view of the D3 engine and offers administrative functionalities.
DeliveryMode Defines the D3 delivery modes.
 

Package com.orchestranetworks.d3 Description

Provides classes for distributed data delivery (D3) functionalities.
